text: O vy shcho vvazhayete, ne befriend aut·saydery shcho nikoly ne prypynyayutʹsya pobazhaty vam shkodu; vony navitʹ bazhayutʹ pobachyty vy strazhdayete. Nenavystʹ techiya z yikhnikh hyrl ta shcho vony khovayutʹsya u yikhnikh skrynyakh ye daleko hirshi. My takym chynom roz'yasnyayemo apokalipsys dlya vas, yakshcho vy rozumiyete
